tool_description: Defines vendor qualification criteria and minimum requirements for RFP participation eligibility.

minimum_experience_years.description: Minimum years of relevant industry experience (0-50)

minimum_annual_revenue.description: Minimum annual revenue requirement in USD

error_messages: Invalid experience requirement: Minimum experience years must be between 0 and 50.
Invalid revenue threshold: Annual revenue must be a positive number if specified.
Too many references required: Reference count must be between 1 and 20.
Invalid geographic format: Geographic presence should specify valid countries, states, or regions.
Unrealistic qualification criteria: Criteria may be too restrictive and limit vendor participation.
usage: Set minimum_experience_years and optionally specify required_certifications, minimum_annual_revenue, geographic_presence, and reference_count. The tool generates vendor qualification requirements for RFP inclusion.

qualification_criteria.description: Formatted vendor qualification section for RFP

estimated_qualified_vendors.description: Estimated number of vendors likely to meet criteria
